column4: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ On the morning of June 24
column6: the Anti-Corruption Unit (ACU) arrested six people and took them to the Phnom Penh Court of First Instance.------Oknha Sok Bun
column7: who was sentenced to 3 years imprisonment (10 months inside and the rest suspended) in 2016 over a vicious assault on a female TV personality in a Phnom Penh nightclub in 2015.------Details are scant
column8: but the real estate mogul and the other 5 are believed to be facing fraud charges involving land sales in Sihanoukville.
